actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that no applications for construction licenses under the Act for production or utilization facilities shall be acted upon by the Commission unless the proposed facility has been approved by affected States.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to stipulate that licenses for construction or modification of nuclear materials production or utilization facilities must be approved by affected States prior to application for approval by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission. Authorizes States to adopt safety standards which are more stringent than Federal requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide that no applications for construction licenses under the Act for production or utilization facilities shall be acted upon by the Commission unless the proposed facility has been approved by affected States.
